attributes.action: help the poor and even the middle classes!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seem's more and more people are strapped for cash! It must be a recipe for a disaster! The rich must relize that without the poor they would not have the life they have today! but be carefull because the middle classes are being sucked in too! be warned!

rejection.details: Please give an explicit action for HM Government
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
